ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Setup.ValidationControl__c.Bypass_Validations__c), NOT(ISBLANK(Salary__c)), OR( Salary__c < 20000, Salary__c > 1000000, AND( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Applied"), Salary__c > 500000 ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Salary must be between $20,000 and $1,000,000. For Applied status, salary cannot exceed $500,000 without approval."
